00039 #define BEVEL_FLAG  1
00040 #define BEVEL_DEL   2
00041 #define FACE_NEW    4
00042 #define EDGE_OLD    8
00043 #define FACE_OLD    16
00044 #define VERT_OLD    32
00045 #define FACE_SPAN   64
00046 #define FACE_HOLE   128
00047 
00048 typedef struct LoopTag {
00049     BMVert *newv;
00050 } LoopTag;
00051 
00052 typedef struct EdgeTag {
00053     BMVert *newv1, *newv2;
00054 } EdgeTag;
00055 
00056 static void calc_corner_co(BMLoop *l, const float fac, float r_co[3],
00057                            const short do_dist, const short do_even)
00058 {
00059     float  no[3], l_vec_prev[3], l_vec_next[3], l_co_prev[3], l_co[3], l_co_next[3], co_ofs[3];
00060     int is_concave;
00061 
00062     /* first get the prev/next verts */
00063     if (l->f->len > 2) {
00064         copy_v3_v3(l_co_prev, l->prev->v->co);
00065         copy_v3_v3(l_co, l->v->co);
00066         copy_v3_v3(l_co_next, l->next->v->co);
00067 
00068         /* calculate normal */
00069         sub_v3_v3v3(l_vec_prev, l_co_prev, l_co);
00070         sub_v3_v3v3(l_vec_next, l_co_next, l_co);
00071 
00072         cross_v3_v3v3(no, l_vec_prev, l_vec_next);
00073         is_concave = dot_v3v3(no, l->f->no) > 0.0f;
00074     }
00075     else {
00076         BMIter iter;
00077         BMLoop *l2;
00078         float up[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f};
00079 
00080         copy_v3_v3(l_co_prev, l->prev->v->co);
00081         copy_v3_v3(l_co, l->v->co);
00082         
00083         BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &iter, l->v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00084             if (l2->f != l->f) {
00085                 copy_v3_v3(l_co_next, BM_edge_other_vert(l2->e, l2->next->v)->co);
00086                 break;
00087             }
00088         }
00089         
00090         sub_v3_v3v3(l_vec_prev, l_co_prev, l_co);
00091         sub_v3_v3v3(l_vec_next, l_co_next, l_co);
00092 
00093         cross_v3_v3v3(no, l_vec_prev, l_vec_next);
00094         if (dot_v3v3(no, no) == 0.0f) {
00095             no[0] = no[1] = 0.0f; no[2] = -1.0f;
00096         }
00097         
00098         is_concave = dot_v3v3(no, up) < 0.0f;
00099     }
00100 
00101 
00102     /* now calculate the new location */
00103     if (do_dist) { /* treat 'fac' as distance */
00104 
00105         normalize_v3(l_vec_prev);
00106         normalize_v3(l_vec_next);
00107 
00108         add_v3_v3v3(co_ofs, l_vec_prev, l_vec_next);
00109         if (UNLIKELY(normalize_v3(co_ofs) == 0.0f)) { /* edges form a straignt line */
00110             cross_v3_v3v3(co_ofs, l_vec_prev, l->f->no);
00111         }
00112 
00113         if (do_even) {
00114             negate_v3(l_vec_next);
00115             mul_v3_fl(co_ofs, fac * shell_angle_to_dist(0.5f * angle_normalized_v3v3(l_vec_prev, l_vec_next)));
00116             /* negate_v3(l_vec_next); */ /* no need unless we use again */
00117         }
00118         else {
00119             mul_v3_fl(co_ofs, fac);
00120         }
00121     }
00122     else { /* treat as 'fac' as a factor (0 - 1) */
00123 
00124         /* not strictly necessary, balance vectors
00125          * so the longer edge doesn't skew the result,
00126          * gives nicer, move even output.
00127          *
00128          * Use the minimum rather then the middle value so skinny faces don't flip along the short axis */
00129         float min_fac = minf(normalize_v3(l_vec_prev), normalize_v3(l_vec_next));
00130         float angle;
00131 
00132         if (do_even) {
00133             negate_v3(l_vec_next);
00134             angle = angle_normalized_v3v3(l_vec_prev, l_vec_next);
00135             negate_v3(l_vec_next); /* no need unless we use again */
00136         }
00137         else {
00138             angle = 0.0f;
00139         }
00140 
00141         mul_v3_fl(l_vec_prev, min_fac);
00142         mul_v3_fl(l_vec_next, min_fac);
00143 
00144         add_v3_v3v3(co_ofs, l_vec_prev, l_vec_next);
00145 
00146         if (UNLIKELY(is_zero_v3(co_ofs))) {
00147             cross_v3_v3v3(co_ofs, l_vec_prev, l->f->no);
00148             normalize_v3(co_ofs);
00149             mul_v3_fl(co_ofs, min_fac);
00150         }
00151 
00152         /* done */
00153         if (do_even) {
00154             mul_v3_fl(co_ofs, (fac * 0.5) * shell_angle_to_dist(0.5f * angle));
00155         }
00156         else {
00157             mul_v3_fl(co_ofs, fac * 0.5);
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00161     /* apply delta vec */
00162     if (is_concave)
00163         negate_v3(co_ofs);
00164 
00165     add_v3_v3v3(r_co, co_ofs, l->v->co);
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 #define ETAG_SET(e, v, nv)  (                                                 \
00170     (v) == (e)->v1 ?                                                          \
00171         (etags[BM_elem_index_get((e))].newv1 = (nv)) :                        \
00172         (etags[BM_elem_index_get((e))].newv2 = (nv))                          \
00173     )
00174 
00175 #define ETAG_GET(e, v)  (                                                     \
00176     (v) == (e)->v1 ?                                                          \
00177         (etags[BM_elem_index_get((e))].newv1) :                               \
00178         (etags[BM_elem_index_get((e))].newv2)                                 \
00179     )
00180 
00181 void bmo_bevel_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00182 {
00183     BMOIter siter;
00184     BMIter iter;
00185     BMEdge *e;
00186     BMVert *v;
00187     BMFace **faces = NULL, *f;
00188     LoopTag *tags = NULL, *tag;
00189     EdgeTag *etags = NULL;
00190     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00191     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00192     BLI_array_declare(faces);
00193     BLI_array_declare(tags);
00194     BLI_array_declare(etags);
00195     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00196     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00197     SmallHash hash;
00198     float fac = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "percent");
00199     const short do_even = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_even");
00200     const short do_dist = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_dist");
00201     int i, li, has_elens, HasMDisps = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS);
00202     
00203     has_elens = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_PROP_FLT) && BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_lengths");
00204     if (has_elens) {
00205         li = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "lengthlayer");
00206     }
00207     
00208     BLI_smallhash_init(&hash);
00209     
00210     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "geom", BM_EDGE) {
00211         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, BEVEL_FLAG|BEVEL_DEL);
00212         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, BEVEL_FLAG|BEVEL_DEL);
00213         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, BEVEL_FLAG|BEVEL_DEL);
00214         
00215         if (BM_edge_face_count(e) < 2) {
00216             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, BEVEL_DEL);
00217             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v1, BEVEL_DEL);
00218             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v2, BEVEL_DEL);
00219         }
00220 #if 0
00221         if (BM_edge_face_count(e) == 0) {
00222             BMVert *verts[2] = {e->v1, e->v2};
00223             BMEdge *edges[2] = {e, BM_edge_create(bm, e->v1, e->v2, e, 0)};
00224             
00225             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, edges[1], BEVEL_FLAG);
00226             BM_face_create(bm, verts, edges, 2, FALSE);
00227         }
00228 #endif
00229     }
00230     
00231     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00232         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, VERT_OLD);
00233     }
00234 
00235 #if 0
00236     //a bit of cleaner code that, alas, doens't work.
00237     /* build edge tag */
00238     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00239         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->v1, BEVEL_FLAG) || BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->v2, BEVEL_FLAG)) {
00240             BMIter liter;
00241             BMLoop *l;
00242             
00243             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_OLD)) {
00244                 BM_elem_index_set(e, BLI_array_count(etags)); /* set_dirty! */
00245                 BLI_array_growone(etags);
00246                 
00247                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_OLD);
00248             }
00249             
00250             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
00251                 BMLoop *l2;
00252                 BMIter liter2;
00253                 
00254                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->f, BEVEL_FLAG))
00255                     continue;
00256 
00257                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, l->f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00258                     BM_elem_index_set(l2, BLI_array_count(tags)); /* set_loop */
00259                     BLI_array_growone(tags);
00260 
00261                     if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l2->e, EDGE_OLD)) {
00262                         BM_elem_index_set(l2->e, BLI_array_count(etags)); /* set_dirty! */
00263                         BLI_array_growone(etags);
00264                         
00265                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l2->e, EDGE_OLD);
00266                     }
00267                 }
00268 
00269                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l->f, BEVEL_FLAG);
00270                 BLI_array_append(faces, l->f);
00271             }
00272         }
00273         else {
00274             BM_elem_index_set(e, -1); /* set_dirty! */
00275         }
00276     }
00277 #endif
00278     
00279     /* create and assign looptag structure */
00280     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "geom", BM_EDGE) {
00281         BMLoop *l;
00282         BMIter liter;
00283 
00284         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v1, BEVEL_FLAG|BEVEL_DEL);
00285         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->v2, BEVEL_FLAG|BEVEL_DEL);
00286         
00287         if (BM_edge_face_count(e) < 2) {
00288             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, BEVEL_DEL);
00289             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v1, BEVEL_DEL);
00290             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e->v2, BEVEL_DEL);
00291         }
00292         
00293         if (!BLI_smallhash_haskey(&hash, (intptr_t)e)) {
00294             BLI_array_growone(etags);
00295             BM_elem_index_set(e, BLI_array_count(etags) - 1); /* set_dirty! */
00296             BLI_smallhash_insert(&hash, (intptr_t)e, NULL);
00297             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_OLD);
00298         }
00299         
00300         /* find all faces surrounding e->v1 and, e->v2 */
00301         for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00302             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, i ? e->v2:e->v1, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00303                 BMLoop *l2;
00304                 BMIter liter2;
00305                 
00306                 /* see if we've already processed this loop's fac */
00307                 if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(&hash, (intptr_t)l->f))
00308                     continue;
00309                 
00310                 /* create tags for all loops in l-> */
00311                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, l->f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00312                     BLI_array_growone(tags);
00313                     BM_elem_index_set(l2, BLI_array_count(tags) - 1); /* set_loop */
00314                     
00315                     if (!BLI_smallhash_haskey(&hash, (intptr_t)l2->e)) {
00316                         BLI_array_growone(etags);
00317                         BM_elem_index_set(l2->e, BLI_array_count(etags) - 1); /* set_dirty! */
00318                         BLI_smallhash_insert(&hash, (intptr_t)l2->e, NULL);
00319                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l2->e, EDGE_OLD);
00320                     }
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 BLI_smallhash_insert(&hash, (intptr_t)l->f, NULL);
00324                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l->f, BEVEL_FLAG);
00325                 BLI_array_append(faces, l->f);
00326             }
00327         }
00328     }
00329 
00330     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_EDGE;
00331     
00332     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00333         BMIter eiter;
00334         
00335         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, BEVEL_FLAG))
00336             continue;
00337         
00338         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00339             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, BEVEL_FLAG) && !ETAG_GET(e, v)) {
00340                 BMVert *v2;
00341                 float co[3];
00342                 
00343                 v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, v);
00344                 sub_v3_v3v3(co, v2->co, v->co);
00345                 if (has_elens) {
00346                     float elen = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00347 
00348                     normalize_v3(co);
00349                     mul_v3_fl(co, elen);
00350                 }
00351                 
00352                 mul_v3_fl(co, fac);
00353                 add_v3_v3(co, v->co);
00354                 
00355                 v2 = BM_vert_create(bm, co, v);
00356                 ETAG_SET(e, v, v2);
00357             }
00358         }
00359     }
00360     
00361     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(faces); i++) {
00362         BMLoop *l;
00363         BMIter liter;
00364         
00365         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, faces[i], FACE_OLD);
00366         
00367         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, faces[i], BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00368             float co[3];
00369 
00370             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, BEVEL_FLAG)) {
00371                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->prev->e, BEVEL_FLAG)) {
00372                     tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00373                     calc_corner_co(l, fac, co, do_dist, do_even);
00374                     tag->newv = BM_vert_create(bm, co, l->v);
00375                 }
00376                 else {
00377                     tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00378                     tag->newv = ETAG_GET(l->prev->e, l->v);
00379                     
00380                     if (!tag->newv) {
00381                         sub_v3_v3v3(co, l->prev->v->co, l->v->co);
00382                         if (has_elens) {
00383                             float elen = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l->prev->e->head.data,
00384                                                                           CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00385 
00386                             normalize_v3(co);
00387                             mul_v3_fl(co, elen);
00388                         }
00389 
00390                         mul_v3_fl(co, fac);
00391                         add_v3_v3(co, l->v->co);
00392 
00393                         tag->newv = BM_vert_create(bm, co, l->v);
00394                         
00395                         ETAG_SET(l->prev->e, l->v, tag->newv);
00396                     }
00397                 }
00398             }
00399             else if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->v, BEVEL_FLAG)) {
00400                 tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00401                 tag->newv = ETAG_GET(l->e, l->v);
00402 
00403                 if (!tag->newv) {
00404                     sub_v3_v3v3(co, l->next->v->co, l->v->co);
00405                     if (has_elens) {
00406                         float elen = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l->e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00407 
00408                         normalize_v3(co);
00409                         mul_v3_fl(co, elen);
00410                     }
00411                     
00412                     mul_v3_fl(co, fac);
00413                     add_v3_v3(co, l->v->co);
00414 
00415                     tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00416                     tag->newv = BM_vert_create(bm, co, l->v);
00417                     
00418                     ETAG_SET(l->e, l->v, tag->newv);
00419                 }
00420             }
00421             else {
00422                 tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00423                 tag->newv = l->v;
00424                 BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, l->v, BEVEL_DEL);
00425             }
00426         }
00427     }
00428     
00429     /* create new faces inset from original face */
00430     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(faces); i++) {
00431         BMLoop *l;
00432         BMIter liter;
00433         BMFace *f;
00434         BMVert *lastv = NULL, *firstv = NULL;
00435 
00436         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, faces[i], BEVEL_DEL);
00437         
00438         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00439         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00440         
00441         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, faces[i], BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00442             BMVert *v2;
00443             
00444             tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00445             BLI_array_append(verts, tag->newv);
00446             
00447             if (!firstv)
00448                 firstv = tag->newv;
00449             
00450             if (lastv) {
00451                 e = BM_edge_create(bm, lastv, tag->newv, l->e, TRUE);
00452                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->prev->e, e);
00453                 BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00454             }
00455             lastv = tag->newv;
00456             
00457             v2 = ETAG_GET(l->e, l->next->v);
00458             
00459             tag = &tags[BM_elem_index_get(l->next)];
00460             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, BEVEL_FLAG) && v2 && v2 != tag->newv) {
00461                 BLI_array_append(verts, v2);
00462                 
00463                 e = BM_edge_create(bm, lastv, v2, l->e, TRUE);
00464                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->e, e);
00465                 
00466                 BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00467                 lastv = v2;
00468             }
00469         }
00470         
00471         e = BM_edge_create(bm, firstv, lastv, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(faces[i])->e, TRUE);
00472         if (BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(faces[i])->prev->e != e) {
00473             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(faces[i])->prev->e, e);
00474         }
00475         BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00476         
00477         f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, verts[0], verts[1], edges, BLI_array_count(edges), FALSE);
00478         if (!f) {
00479             printf("%s: could not make face!\n", __func__);
00480             continue;
00481         }
00482 
00483         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
00484     }
00485 
00486     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(faces); i++) {
00487         BMLoop *l;
00488         BMIter liter;
00489         int j;
00490         
00491         /* create quad spans between split edge */
00492         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, faces[i], BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00493             BMVert *v1 = NULL, *v2 = NULL, *v3 = NULL, *v4 = NULL;
00494             
00495             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, BEVEL_FLAG))
00496                 continue;
00497             
00498             v1 = tags[BM_elem_index_get(l)].newv;
00499             v2 = tags[BM_elem_index_get(l->next)].newv;
00500             if (l->radial_next != l) {
00501                 v3 = tags[BM_elem_index_get(l->radial_next)].newv;
00502                 if (l->radial_next->next->v == l->next->v) {
00503                     v4 = v3;
00504                     v3 = tags[BM_elem_index_get(l->radial_next->next)].newv;
00505                 }
00506                 else {
00507                     v4 = tags[BM_elem_index_get(l->radial_next->next)].newv;
00508                 }
00509             }
00510             else {
00511                 /* the loop is on a boundar */
00512                 v3 = l->next->v;
00513                 v4 = l->v;
00514                 
00515                 for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
00516                     BMIter eiter;
00517                     BMVert *v = j ? v4 : v3;
00518 
00519                     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00520                         if (!BM_vert_in_edge(e, v3) || !BM_vert_in_edge(e, v4))
00521                             continue;
00522                         
00523                         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, BEVEL_FLAG) && BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_OLD)) {
00524                             BMVert *vv;
00525                             
00526                             vv = ETAG_GET(e, v);
00527                             if (!vv || BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, vv, BEVEL_FLAG))
00528                                 continue;
00529                             
00530                             if (j) {
00531                                 v1 = vv;
00532                             }
00533                             else {
00534                                 v2 = vv;
00535                             }
00536                             break;
00537                         }
00538                     }
00539                 }
00540 
00541                 BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, v3, BEVEL_DEL);
00542                 BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, v4, BEVEL_DEL);
00543             }
00544             
00545             if (v1 != v2 && v2 != v3 && v3 != v4) {
00546                 BMIter liter2;
00547                 BMLoop *l2, *l3;
00548                 BMEdge *e1, *e2;
00549                 float d1, d2, *d3;
00550                 
00551                 f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm, v4, v3, v2, v1, l->f, TRUE);
00552 
00553                 e1 = BM_edge_exists(v4, v3);
00554                 e2 = BM_edge_exists(v2, v1);
00555                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->e, e1);
00556                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->e, e2);
00557                 
00558                 /* set edge lengths of cross edges as the average of the cross edges they're based o */
00559                 if (has_elens) {
00560                     /* angle happens not to be used. why? - not sure it just isn't - campbell.
00561                      * leave this in in case we need to use it later */
00562 #if 0
00563                     float ang;
00564 #endif
00565                     e1 = BM_edge_exists(v1, v4);
00566                     e2 = BM_edge_exists(v2, v3);
00567                     
00568                     if (l->radial_next->v == l->v) {
00569                         l2 = l->radial_next->prev;
00570                         l3 = l->radial_next->next;
00571                     }
00572                     else {
00573                         l2 = l->radial_next->next;
00574                         l3 = l->radial_next->prev;
00575                     }
00576                     
00577                     d3 = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, e1->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00578                     d1 = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l->prev->e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00579                     d2 = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l2->e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00580 #if 0
00581                     ang = angle_v3v3v3(l->prev->v->co, l->v->co, BM_edge_other_vert(l2->e, l->v)->co);
00582 #endif
00583                     *d3 = (d1 + d2) * 0.5f;
00584                     
00585                     d3 = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, e2->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00586                     d1 = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l->next->e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00587                     d2 = *(float *)CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->edata, l3->e->head.data, CD_PROP_FLT, li);
00588 #if 0
00589                     ang = angle_v3v3v3(BM_edge_other_vert(l->next->e, l->next->v)->co, l->next->v->co,
00590                                        BM_edge_other_vert(l3->e, l->next->v)->co);
00591 #endif
00592                     *d3 = (d1 + d2) * 0.5f;
00593                 }
00594 
00595                 if (!f) {
00596                     fprintf(stderr, "%s: face index out of range! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__);
00597                     continue;
00598                 }
00599                 
00600                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW|FACE_SPAN);
00601                 
00602                 /* un-tag edges in f for deletio */
00603                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00604                     BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, l2->e, BEVEL_DEL);
00605                 }
00606             }
00607             else {
00608                 f = NULL;
00609             }
00610         }
00611     }
00612     
00613     /* fill in holes at vertices */
00614     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00615         BMIter eiter;
00616         BMVert *vv, *vstart = NULL, *lastv = NULL;
00617         SmallHash tmphash;
00618         int rad, insorig = 0, err = 0;
00619 
00620         BLI_smallhash_init(&tmphash);
00621 
00622         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, BEVEL_FLAG))
00623             continue;
00624         
00625         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00626         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00627         
00628         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00629             BMIter liter;
00630             BMVert *v1 = NULL, *v2 = NULL;
00631             BMLoop *l;
00632             
00633             if (BM_edge_face_count(e) < 2)
00634                 insorig = 1;
00635             
00636             if (BM_elem_index_get(e) == -1)
00637                 continue;
00638             
00639             rad = 0;
00640             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
00641                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->f, FACE_OLD))
00642                     continue;
00643                 
00644                 rad++;
00645                 
00646                 tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get((l->v == v) ? l : l->next);
00647                 
00648                 if (!v1)
00649                     v1 = tag->newv;
00650                 else if (!v2)
00651                     v2 = tag->newv;
00652             }
00653             
00654             if (rad < 2)
00655                 insorig = 1;
00656             
00657             if (!v1)
00658                 v1 = ETAG_GET(e, v);
00659             if (!v2 || v1 == v2)
00660                 v2 = ETAG_GET(e, v);
00661             
00662             if (v1) {
00663                 if (!BLI_smallhash_haskey(&tmphash, (intptr_t)v1)) {
00664                     BLI_array_append(verts, v1);
00665                     BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)v1, NULL);
00666                 }
00667                 
00668                 if (v2 && v1 != v2 && !BLI_smallhash_haskey(&tmphash, (intptr_t)v2)) {
00669                     BLI_array_append(verts, v2);
00670                     BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)v2, NULL);
00671                 }
00672             }
00673         }
00674         
00675         if (!BLI_array_count(verts))
00676             continue;
00677         
00678         if (insorig) {
00679             BLI_array_append(verts, v);
00680             BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)v, NULL);
00681         }
00682         
00683         /* find edges that exist between vertices in verts.  this is basically
00684          * a topological walk of the edges connecting them */
00685         vstart = vstart ? vstart : verts[0];
00686         vv = vstart;
00687         do {
00688             BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, vv, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00689                 BMVert *vv2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, vv);
00690                 
00691                 if (vv2 != lastv && BLI_smallhash_haskey(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2)) {
00692                     /* if we've go over the same vert twice, break out of outer loop */
00693                     if (BLI_smallhash_lookup(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2) != NULL) {
00694                         e = NULL;
00695                         err = 1;
00696                         break;
00697                     }
00698                     
00699                     /* use self pointer as ta */
00700                     BLI_smallhash_remove(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2);
00701                     BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2, vv2);
00702                     
00703                     lastv = vv;
00704                     BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00705                     vv = vv2;
00706                     break;
00707                 }
00708             }
00709 
00710             if (e == NULL) {
00711                 break;
00712             }
00713         } while (vv != vstart);
00714         
00715         if (err) {
00716             continue;
00717         }
00718 
00719         /* there may not be a complete loop of edges, so start again and make
00720          * final edge afterwards.  in this case, the previous loop worked to
00721          * find one of the two edges at the extremes. */
00722         if (vv != vstart) {
00723             /* undo previous taggin */
00724             for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(verts); i++) {
00725                 BLI_smallhash_remove(&tmphash, (intptr_t)verts[i]);
00726                 BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)verts[i], NULL);
00727             }
00728 
00729             vstart = vv;
00730             lastv = NULL;
00731             BLI_array_empty(edges);
00732             do {
00733                 BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, vv, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00734                     BMVert *vv2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, vv);
00735                     
00736                     if (vv2 != lastv && BLI_smallhash_haskey(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2)) {
00737                         /* if we've go over the same vert twice, break out of outer loo */
00738                         if (BLI_smallhash_lookup(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2) != NULL) {
00739                             e = NULL;
00740                             err = 1;
00741                             break;
00742                         }
00743                         
00744                         /* use self pointer as ta */
00745                         BLI_smallhash_remove(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2);
00746                         BLI_smallhash_insert(&tmphash, (intptr_t)vv2, vv2);
00747                         
00748                         lastv = vv;
00749                         BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00750                         vv = vv2;
00751                         break;
00752                     }
00753                 }
00754                 if (e == NULL)
00755                     break;
00756             } while (vv != vstart);
00757             
00758             if (!err) {
00759                 e = BM_edge_create(bm, vv, vstart, NULL, TRUE);
00760                 BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00761             }
00762         }
00763         
00764         if (err)
00765             continue;
00766         
00767         if (BLI_array_count(edges) >= 3) {
00768             BMFace *f;
00769             
00770             if (BM_face_exists(bm, verts, BLI_array_count(verts), &f))
00771                 continue;
00772             
00773             f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, lastv, vstart, edges, BLI_array_count(edges), FALSE);
00774             if (!f) {
00775                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: in bevel vert fill! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__);
00776             }
00777             else {
00778                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW|FACE_HOLE);
00779             }
00780         }
00781         BLI_smallhash_release(&tmphash);
00782     }
00783     
00784     /* copy over customdat */
00785     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(faces); i++) {
00786         BMLoop *l;
00787         BMIter liter;
00788         BMFace *f = faces[i];
00789         
00790         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00791             BMLoop *l2;
00792             BMIter liter2;
00793             
00794             tag = tags + BM_elem_index_get(l);
00795             if (!tag->newv)
00796                 continue;
00797             
00798             BM_ITER_ELEM (l2, &liter2, tag->newv, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00799                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l2->f, FACE_NEW) || (l2->v != tag->newv && l2->v != l->v))
00800                     continue;
00801                 
00802                 if (tag->newv != l->v || HasMDisps) {
00803                     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->f, l2->f);
00804                     BM_loop_interp_from_face(bm, l2, l->f, TRUE, TRUE);
00805                 }
00806                 else {
00807                     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l->f, l2->f);
00808                     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l, l2);
00809                 }
00810                 
00811                 if (HasMDisps) {
00812                     BMLoop *l3;
00813                     BMIter liter3;
00814                     
00815                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l3, &liter3, l2->f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00816                         BM_loop_interp_multires(bm, l3, l->f);
00817                     }
00818                 }
00819             }
00820         }
00821     }
00822     
00823     /* handle vertices along boundary edge */
00824     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00825         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_OLD) &&
00826             BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, BEVEL_FLAG) &&
00827             !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, BEVEL_DEL))
00828         {
00829             BMLoop *l;
00830             BMLoop *lorig = NULL;
00831             BMIter liter;
00832             
00833             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00834                 // BMIter liter2;
00835                 // BMLoop *l2 = l->v == v ? l : l->next, *l3;
00836                 
00837                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->f, FACE_OLD)) {
00838                     lorig = l;
00839                     break;
00840                 }
00841             }
00842             
00843             if (!lorig)
00844                 continue;
00845             
00846             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00847                 BMLoop *l2 = l->v == v ? l : l->next;
00848                 
00849                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, lorig->f, l2->f);
00850                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, lorig, l2);
00851             }
00852         }
00853     }
00854 #if 0
00855     /* clean up any remaining 2-edged face */
00856     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00857         if (f->len == 2) {
00858             BMFace *faces[2] = {f, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f)->radial_next->f};
00859             
00860             if (faces[0] == faces[1])
00861                 BM_face_kill(bm, f);
00862             else
00863                 BM_faces_join(bm, faces, 2);
00864         }
00865     }
00866 #endif
00867 
00868     BMO_op_callf(bm, "del geom=%fv context=%i", BEVEL_DEL, DEL_VERTS);
00869 
00870     /* clean up any edges that might not get properly delete */
00871     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00872         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_OLD) && !e->l)
00873             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, BEVEL_DEL);
00874     }
00875 
00876     BMO_op_callf(bm, "del geom=%fe context=%i", BEVEL_DEL, DEL_EDGES);
00877     BMO_op_callf(bm, "del geom=%ff context=%i", BEVEL_DEL, DEL_FACES);
00878     
00879     BLI_smallhash_release(&hash);
00880     BLI_array_free(tags);
00881     BLI_array_free(etags);
00882     BLI_array_free(verts);
00883     BLI_array_free(edges);
00884     BLI_array_free(faces);
00885     
00886     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "face_spans", BM_FACE, FACE_SPAN);
00887     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "face_holes", BM_FACE, FACE_HOLE);
00888 }
